review: Works very good, just what I wanted.

review: Love the stick, easy to use it. Had to use Wii system to go to Netflix or Hulu, now everything is right there one time log in and I'm all set. Thanks.
author: Samantha Caine

review: Installed easily and remote is tightly paired at the moment of install. Their is more interesting content that requires more fees that I perceived that may be just me.

review: Good choices.  Works great and with ease.
